attributes.action: MPs should be forced to declare secret society membership
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the on going child abuse scandals and the repeated naming of Freemason members, we the public believe it is of the utmost importance that the religion & Freemasonry membership of MP's be made publicly available & easily accessible on the government website.

The public should not have to put in a FOI request to to find out information that should be publicly declared in the first place, we have a right to know who is in control of our reality.

We the public are not against Freemasonry but we must know who is in control of our government. There should be no reason for Freemason members who are not guilty of any crime providing this information to citizens who simply wish to understand who controls the British government.

http://tinyurl.com/pbrbm6e

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for Government
